start.gm_instructions:
You must unlock the sector in order for the vessels to continue the transition after you lock it.
^^
Use GM selection to define start location when creating vessels

warning_popup_message.message: The lead ship will be PVTR Jimi-Saru
Game Will NOT play without lead ship PVTR Jimi-Saru

folder_arme.name: Fuel Collection System For known ships

event.name: CreateGrid 2,2
event.incoming_comms_text: All Craft, Be advised, We are studying creatures in this area and we believe they have abnormal abilities.

All Craft, Be advised, We are studying creatures in this area and we believe they have abnormal abilities.

event.name: SectorLocking
event.incoming_comms_text: Hold your position in this sector, Priority Message for Commanding Officer incoming.

event.name: SectorUnLocking
event.incoming_comms_text: Commanding Officer, carry out debrief session with your crew if neccessary, then carry on.
